about.description:
The glibc package contains standard libraries which are used by multiple
programs on the system. In order to save disk space and memory, as well as to
make upgrading easier, common system code is kept in one place and shared
between programs. This particular package contains the most important sets of
shared libraries: the standard C library and the standard math library.
Without these two libraries, a Linux system will not function.

Kernel-headers includes the C header files that specify the interface between
the Linux kernel and userspace libraries and programs.  The header files
define structures and constants that are needed for building most standard
programs and are also needed for rebuilding the glibc package.
about.license: LGPL-2.0-or-later AND LGPL-2.0-or-later WITH exceptions AND GPL-2.0-or-later
about.summary: (CDT) The GNU libc libraries and header files for the Linux kernel for use by glibc

name: sysroot-cos7-aarch64
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.19.2
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: sysroot-cos7-aarch64
    version: '2.17'
source:
    -   folder: binary
        sha256: 0d86de50873347411a40c7e7f27d39c58c64de8b7893ba9ee6be351754c484ec
        url: http://mirror.centos.org/altarch/7/os/aarch64/Packages/glibc-2.17-307.el7.1.aarch64.rpm
    -   folder: binary-glibc-common
        sha256: d5223860fad4efc04dbc9a7b08bc87c183df8605f457e8fedb412783b4845a1b
        url: http://mirror.centos.org/altarch/7/os/aarch64/Packages/glibc-common-2.17-307.el7.1.aarch64.rpm
    -   folder: binary-glibc-devel
        sha256: 2e763b0032bc347e136d301893b68a01e56538edce64328a3356141bbed4b186
        url: http://mirror.centos.org/altarch/7/os/aarch64/Packages/glibc-devel-2.17-307.el7.1.aarch64.rpm
    -   folder: binary-tzdata
        sha256: a467bd14a5f0fec9e6227eae6aac92c155947a102e818c2bb62e2339e44a694a
        url: http://mirror.centos.org/altarch/7/os/aarch64/Packages/tzdata-2019c-1.el7.noarch.rpm
    -   folder: binary-glibc-headers
        sha256: 89ff7a55c845b8bf224956d40f80f8279a734d0499006de581dd267754def148
        url: http://mirror.centos.org/altarch/7/os/aarch64/Packages/glibc-headers-2.17-307.el7.1.aarch64.rpm
    -   folder: binary-kernel-headers
        sha256: 9e9ea85efa4c1e20c1978fca84bb7f8ba17e7ad610717af2929c4d71ff384060
        url: http://mirror.centos.org/altarch/7/os/aarch64/Packages/kernel-headers-4.18.0-147.8.1.el7.aarch64.rpm
build:
    noarch: generic
    number: 9
    string: hca5cc2b_9
requirements:
    run:
        - sysroot_linux-aarch64 ==2.17
test:
    commands:
        - test -f $PREFIX/aarch64-conda-linux-gnu/sysroot/lib/libc.so.6
        - test -f $PREFIX/aarch64-conda-linux-gnu/sysroot/sbin/ldconfig
        - test -f $PREFIX/aarch64-conda-linux-gnu/sysroot/usr/lib/crt1.o
        - test -f $PREFIX/aarch64-conda-linux-gnu/sysroot/usr/include/limits.h
        - test -f $PREFIX/aarch64-conda-linux-gnu/sysroot/usr/include/gnu/stubs.h
        - test -d $PREFIX/aarch64-conda-linux-gnu/sysroot/usr/share/locale
        - test -f $PREFIX/aarch64-conda-linux-gnu/sysroot/usr/bin/ldd
        - test -f $PREFIX/aarch64-conda-linux-gnu/sysroot/lib/libc.so.6
about:
    description: 'The glibc package contains standard libraries which are used by
        multiple

        programs on the system. In order to save disk space and memory, as well as
        to

        make upgrading easier, common system code is kept in one place and shared

        between programs. This particular package contains the most important sets
        of

        shared libraries: the standard C library and the standard math library.

        Without these two libraries, a Linux system will not function.


        Kernel-headers includes the C header files that specify the interface between

        the Linux kernel and userspace libraries and programs.  The header files

        define structures and constants that are needed for building most standard

        programs and are also needed for rebuilding the glibc package.

        '
    home: http://sources.redhat.com/glibc/
    license: LGPL-2.0-or-later AND LGPL-2.0-or-later WITH exceptions AND GPL-2.0-or-later
    license_family: GPL
    summary: (CDT) The GNU libc libraries and header files for the Linux kernel for
        use by glibc
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - beckermr
        - isuruf
        - scopatz
